about_the_game:
RutonyChat is a program for receiving messages from chats and notifications from various streaming sites in one window.

Along with the program comes a large set of ready-made designs for chat, which can still be customized.

Alerts designer, Donate goal, List alerts will help you create unusual alerts with various effects for events, whether it's a follower, new subscriber, re-subscriber, donate, or simply show a specially prepared alert using a keyboard key, or even just play a sound as a joke. Together with the Remote Control functions, you can create complex combinations of design for streaming or during video recording.

Extensive features allow you to increase the interactivity with the chat, such as general voting, prize draw, remote control, ranking system, a small chat bot and much more.

RutonyChat features

  • Supports chats Twitch, Goodgame, YouTube, Trovo.Live, WASD, VKontakte, Odnoklassniki, Peka2.tv, PandaTV, Douyu, Smashcast, GamersTV, GipsyTeam, Aces, Steam
  • Support for notifications about free and paid subscriptions, about various events
  • Notifications Donate from StreamLabs, DonationAlerts, DonatePay, QIWI, DonateStream, Destream, Donatty
  • Supports all emoticons, including 3nd developers, like BTTV & FFZ, and other
  • Highlights messages to streamer (you can set all the names to highlight in the settings)
  • Over 70 visual appearence themes with different animations and styles (you can see themes on website)
  • Bot for Twitch, GoodGame, YouTube, VKontakte
  • Designer Alerts (follower, subs, etc.)
  • Designer Alerts List
  • Designer Goals (donate, subs, followers, etc.)
  • Raffles and votepolls
  • Remote control - run scripts, plays sounds, alerts...
  • Rank system - icon near nickname, credits system, etc.
  • Labels for last subscriber, top donation, goals, counters, etc.
  • Game mode - if you have one monitor (for window game mode) (ATTENTION! Only for windowed mode, it may not work in full screen mode)
